title: Time Taken
alt: A screenshot of Café Leblanc in Persona 5: The Phantom X.

content.html: If Wishfield was irresistible before, my foolish brain had no chance of ignoring more Persona 5 now. Gambling crap aside, I’m just glad that catching up with the story was fun, and it didn’t take as much time as crafting the Wishful Aurosa—I think.
